item.title: About Us
item.description:
About Us

Hello everyone, Welcome to The Coding World Blog (CDW Blog).

Coding World Blog is a blog where we will post the articles about the fronted design such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript design. We will also posting some tutorial article about web development, useful tool and etc. In this blog, all the design will be open source and I will sharing the source code directly in the posts.

If you have any problem when reading post in our blog, you can contact us by :

  • Email : codingworld35@gmail.com
  • Facebook : https://facebook.com/cdwteam
  • GitHub : https://github.com/cdwblog
